member.name: T:ConsoleAppVisuals.Attributes.VisualAttribute
member.summary: The class is used to mark a class, struct, enum, constructor, method, property, field, event, interface, or delegate as a visual and so interact with the console.
member.remarks: [ WARNING ] This element cannot be tested.

member.name: M:ConsoleAppVisuals.Attributes.VisualAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:ConsoleAppVisuals.Attributes.VisualAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified workaround message.
member.param: The text string that describes alternative workarounds.

member.name: M:ConsoleAppVisuals.Attributes.VisualAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a workaround message and a Boolean value indicating whether the obsolete element usage is considered an error.
member.param: The text string that describes alternative workarounds.
True if the obsolete element usage generates a compiler error; false if it generates a compiler warning.

member.name: P:ConsoleAppVisuals.Attributes.VisualAttribute.DiagnosticId
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID that the compiler will use when reporting a use of the API.

member.name: P:ConsoleAppVisuals.Attributes.VisualAttribute.IsError
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the compiler will treat usage of the obsolete program element as an error.
member.returns: True if the obsolete element usage is considered an error; otherwise, false. The default is false.

member.name: P:ConsoleAppVisuals.Attributes.VisualAttribute.Message
member.summary: Gets the workaround message.
member.returns: The workaround text string.

member.name: P:ConsoleAppVisuals.Attributes.VisualAttribute.UrlFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL for corresponding documentation. The API accepts a format string instead of an actual URL, creating a generic URL that includes the diagnostic ID.
member.returns: The format string that represents a URL to corresponding documentation.
